---
title: "Distribution of ABIs"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(tidyr)
options(dplyr.summarise.inform = FALSE)
foreign_abis_path <- file.path("../foreign_module_abis.csv")
foreign_abis <- read_csv(
    foreign_abis_path,
    show_col_types = FALSE
) %>% select(name, abi)
```


The maximum number of ABIs defined in a single file.
```{r}
by_count <- foreign_abis %>% group_by(name) %>% summarize(n=n())
print(max(by_count$n))
```

The number of ABI occurrences in files.
